ss.qwirkle.client.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • ss.qwirkle.client.player.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AIPlayer, HumanPlayer, SocketPlayer

    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class representing a player in a Qwirkle match.
    Author:
    Karanum

        Returns the amount of tiles currently in the player's hand.

      • addTilesToHand

        public void addTilesToHand(java.util.List<Tile> tiles)
        Adds a number of tiles to the player's hand. Fails if the player would have too many tiles in their hand after this operation.
        Parameters:
        tiles - Tiles to add to the player's hand.
